CKEditor.ConfigClass_removePlugins=Deaktivierte Plugins CKEditor.ConfigClass_removePlugins.hint=Die Liste der deaktivierten Plugins. CKEditor.ConfigClass_removeButtons=Deaktivierte Toolbar Funktionen CKEditor.ConfigClass_removeButtons.hint=Die Liste der deaktivierten Toolbar Funktionen. CKEditor.ConfigClass_linkShowAdvancedTab=Link: Registerkarte Erweitert anzeigen ### Missing: CKEditor.ConfigClass_linkShowAdvancedTab.hint=Allows you to set link attributes such as id, name, class or style. CKEditor.ConfigClass_linkShowTargetTab=Link: Registerkarte Ziel anzeigen ### Missing: CKEditor.ConfigClass_linkShowTargetTab.hint=Allows you to set the link target attribute (e.g. to open the link in a new tab). CKEditor.ConfigClass_advanced=Erweiterte Konfiguration ### Missing: CKEditor.ConfigClass_advanced.hint=You can write a JavaScript snippet to modify directly the configuration object. Check the {0}CKEditor documentation{1} for the list of available configuration properties.
### Missing: ckeditor.admin.saveComment=Updated the CKEditor configuration from the Administration ckeditor.admin.reset=Zurücksetzen ckeditor.admin.reset.hint=Wiederherstellen der Standard-Konfiguration ckeditor.admin.reset.confirmation=Sind Sie sicher, dass Sie die Standard-Konfiguration wiederherstellen möchten? Alle Änderungen werden verloren gehen.
ckeditor.plugin.link.options=Optionen ckeditor.plugin.link.anchor=Anker ### Missing: ckeditor.plugin.link.queryString=Query String ckeditor.plugin.link.defaultLabel=Link-Text eingeben ckeditor.plugin.link.openInNewTab=Link in neuem Tab öffnen
ckeditor.plugin.macro.placeholder=Makro:{0} ckeditor.plugin.macro.buttonHint=XWiki Makro ckeditor.plugin.macro.refreshFailed=Fehler beim Aktualisieren des bearbeiteten Inhalts. ckeditor.plugin.macro.dedicatedInsertButtonHint={0} Makro einfügen
ckeditor.plugin.office.importer.title=Office-Datei importieren ckeditor.plugin.office.importer.filePath=Dateipfad ckeditor.plugin.office.importer.filePath.hint=Wählen Sie die zu importierende Office-Datei. Die Datei wird hochgeladen und an diese Seite anhängt und ihr Inhalt wird in den Inhalt der Seite eingefügt. ckeditor.plugin.office.importer.filterStyles=Design filtern ### Missing: ckeditor.plugin.office.importer.filterStyles.hint=Filter text styles like font, color, alignment, margins. Content structure including heading levels, paragraphs, lists and tables are preserved. ### Missing: ckeditor.plugin.office.importer.useOfficeViewer=Use the Office Viewer ### Missing: ckeditor.plugin.office.importer.useOfficeViewer.hint=Check this option if you don't plan to edit the content of the office file after the import or if you don't want to mix the content of the office file with the content that you are currently editing. ### Missing: ckeditor.plugin.office.importer.required=Required ### Missing: ckeditor.plugin.office.importer.import=Import ### Missing: ckeditor.plugin.office.importer.inProgress=Importing office file... ### Missing: ckeditor.plugin.office.importer.done=Office file successfully imported. ### Missing: ckeditor.plugin.office.importer.fail=Office import failed. ### Missing: ckeditor.plugin.office.importer.noUploadURL=File upload URL is not configured. ### Missing: ckeditor.plugin.office.importer.failedToLoadForm=Failed to load the form.
### Missing: ckeditor.plugin.resource.notSpecified=The {0} is not specified. ### Missing: ckeditor.plugin.save.leaveConfirmationMessage=There are unsaved changes. Do you want to discard them? ### Missing: ckeditor.plugin.save.failed=The content cannot be saved because of a CKEditor internal error. You should try to copy your important changes and reload the editor. ### Missing: ckeditor.plugin.source.conversionFailed=Failed to perform the conversion.
